verses.name: 2 Thessalonians 2:4
verses.text: Who opposeth and exalteth himself above all that is called God, or that is worshipped; so that he as God sitteth in the temple of God, shewing himself that he is God.

verses.name: 2 Thessalonians 2:5
verses.text: Remember ye not, that, when I was yet with you, I told you these things?

verses.name: 2 Thessalonians 2:6
verses.text: And now ye know what withholdeth that he might be revealed in his time.

verses.name: 2 Thessalonians 2:7
verses.text: For the mystery of iniquity doth already work: only he who now letteth will let, until he be taken out of the way.
